QuestData.Title: Joining the Horde
QuestData.Description: Here we are, $n... Orgrimmar, heart of the Horde.$b$bWe can be helpful beyond the edges of the Wandering Isle. There are innumerable problems out there, just waiting for us to solve them. This is what Master Shang Xi would have wanted.$b$bThere's no better place to start doing that than here, with the aid of the Horde. Let's find out who their leader is. We need allies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Garrosh Hellscream in Orgrimmar.
